Articles.Content: Please allow a bind/key/button to set time warp to 1x. Pretty please. I realize I can click on the bar to instantly set time warp to 1x but having a key to press would be better.
This would be really quite nice. I never use the bar-clicky because I don't like hiding the MET, and sometimes you want to have a "stop everything" button in easy reach.

It should still perform the "standard" transition from non-physics time warp to physics time warp, i.e. run a few frames in x1 non-physics mode before it makes the switch. At least until problems with fast switching are solved.
Yes, please! I've wished for such a key many times.

I think a fairly useful implementation of this would be to simply have the player hold down the timewarp key to quickly drop out to 1x. But if you wanted a "quick cut" key, perhaps a Shift+< would work pretty well.

I support this suggestion.

I remember being told that a "pause button" wasn't possible because Unity can't render without a flow, but a Timewarp x1 is a good alternative.
